results.definition: a depository built to contain books and other materials for reading and study
(computing) a collection of standard programs and subroutines that are stored and available for immediate use
a building that houses a collection of books and other materials
hasInstances: united states national library of medicine

results.definition: a collection of literary documents or records kept for reference or borrowing
a room where books are kept
examples: they had brandy in the library
